title: BMX All Stars
overview: Narrated by Ashley Walters, BMX All Stars follows young riders from one of the most successful clubs in the UK, Peckham BMX.The ten-episode series, packed full with adrenaline-fuelled, BMX racing, also features Olympians Kye Whyte, Beth Shriever, Quillan Isidore and freestyler Charlotte Worthington, as well as pro rider Tian Isidore and freestyler James Jones.
